title: Sample Quiz - Basics
description: A sample quiz demonstrating all question types
author: local

questions.text: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital and largest city of France.

questions.text: Which of the following are primary colors?
questions.explanation: Red, blue, and yellow are the primary colors.

questions.text: The largest planet in our solar system is ________.
questions.explanation: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.

questions.text: Explain why the sky appears blue during the day.
questions.correct: The sky appears blue due to Rayleigh scattering of sunlight by the atmosphere.
questions.explanation: Blue light is scattered more than other colors because it travels in shorter, smaller waves.
